definition: to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: To draft and coordinate the functions of each department;
sentences.chinese: 擬定並協調部機關各單位職責的分工。

sentences.english: Request that all clubs participate in a PolioPlus Partners project.
sentences.chinese: 擬定一個合適的新社員訓練計劃並與所有扶輪社分享。

sentences.english: Meanwhile in the paper, the proposals are given for the municipal development programme mapped out by Fuling Municipality.
sentences.chinese: 同時，對涪陵市擬定城市發展規劃提出建議。

sentences.english: Help to decide recommend personnel list.
sentences.chinese: 協助擬定推薦人員名單。

sentences.english: The proposed method has been applied to the analysis of cefadroxil pharmaceutical raw material powder and capsules with satisfactory results.
sentences.chinese: 用擬定的方法測定原粉和膠囊，結果與藥典法一致。

sentences.english: We are exploring a strategy to extend C-TPAT enrollment to related parties outside of Mexico at a later date.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在擬定對策在以後擴展到墨西哥以外的相關方。

sentences.english: Format refers to the terms of the development in order to re-use and pre-prepared.
sentences.chinese: 格式條款是指擬定方爲了重複使用而預先擬定。

sentences.english: Format refers to the terms of the development in order to re-use and pre-prepared.
sentences.chinese: 格式條款是指擬定方爲了重複使用而預先擬定。

sentences.english: On Monday the negotiation process will begin with a draft resolution.
sentences.chinese: 星期一，談判進程將隨着擬定決議草案開始。

sentences.english: The activity of manganese-dependent peroxidase was determined by using guaiacol as substrate.
sentences.chinese: 擬定了用愈創木酚測定錳過氧化物酶活力的方法。

sentences.english: To formulate guidelines and policies on funeral and interment, push forward related reforms;
sentences.chinese: 擬定殯葬工作方針政策，推行殯葬改革。

sentences.english: The joint-stock project companies can draft relevant systems by referring to this system.
sentences.chinese: 各參股項目公司可參照本制度擬定相關制度。

sentences.english: Now Yang serves as an attaché to the Protocol Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
sentences.chinese: 現在他在中國外交部擔任草案擬定專員。

sentences.english: Arrange the information of 42 Matrix Benchmark and plan safe tactic and the program of safe school.
sentences.chinese: 項指標矩陣資料，擬定安全策略及安全學校計畫。

sentences.english: At last classification scheme of the anti-scourability of soil in Loess Plateau has been drawn up initially.
sentences.chinese: 最後還初步擬定黃土高原土壤抗衝性分級方案。

sentences.english: To organize the study and formulation of development programs for coal mine work safety.
sentences.chinese: 組織研究擬定煤礦安全生產發展規劃。

definition: to set/to designate/to stipulate/to provide/to draw up/to formulate (rules etc)/stipulation
to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
